channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mary J. Blige Loves When Fans Dress as Her for Halloween Because It Means 'I'm a Household Name' (Exclusive)
item.description: "When we were kids, we wanted to be Wonder Woman," Blige recalls to PEOPLE ahead of releasing her new 'For My Fans' concert film

item.title: Demi Lovato Gets Candid About Having Kids, Admits She Thinks 'a Lot' About Having 'Clock That Ticks'
item.description: The singer tied the knot with singer Jutes in May

item.title: Jonathan Van Ness' Weight Loss: Everything the “Queer Eye” Star Has Said About His Health
item.description: Celebrity hairstylist Jonathan Van Ness lost 70 pounds in one year

item.title: Shay Martin Says She's in 'Transformation Widow Era' on 1st Halloween as a Mom Just Months After Husband Tanner's Death
item.description: The couple welcomed daughter AmyLou in May 2025, just over a month before Tanner died from colon cancer

item.title: Teri Hatcher Calls Out Celebrities Who 'Lie' About Plastic Surgery, Says It Makes Others 'Feel Bad'
item.description: The actress, who appeared on 'The Skinny Confidential' podcast, also said a facelift is not the answer to finding "peace" within herself

item.title: 'Love Island' Huda Mustafa Dropped by Huda Beauty Over N-Word Controversy
item.description: 'Love Island' star Huda Mustafa is paying the price for her seriously bad-timed livestream laugh ... 'cause a major makeup brand just pulled the plug ...

item.title: Heidi Klum Struggles With Umbrella in Gale Force Wind on NYC Rooftop, on Video
item.description: Heidi Klum went from "Project Runway" to "Project Rainway" ... 'cause her latest catwalk resembled a wind tunnel -- except it was outside on a rooftop...

item.title: Joe Giudice Says Diddy’s Money Will Make Prison Life Easier

item.title: Celebs' Best Halloween Costumes Through the Years
item.description: Gather around, come near, because Halloween's finally here, and we're looking back at our favorite celebrity costumes over the years! But don't worry,...

item.title: Judge Orders Sia & Estranged Husband to Mediate Child-Custody Issues
